group_1.textRight: ...And upon excavating it, it was a bona-fide@kofun after all.
And since it was a very large kofun...
And since a high-school girl's thesis had prompted@its discovery, it went on to make headlines...
Which made you into a total celebrity,@Komachi-senpai!

group_1.textLeft: ...That was just because the council member@dragged the media into it on purpose.
Since making a news sensation out of it...
Might push the bypass project from "on hold"@into "fully canceled".

group_1.textRight: "University Professor Doffs Hat to Genius@Schoolgirl!"

group_1.textLeft: Well, it's true that they found the burial@chamber perfectly untouched as a result.
So I guess it was alright.

group_1.textRight: And since I got to take advantage of@Komachi-senpai's...
Name recognition amidst all the commotion...
To open a so-called "Historical Research Club"@where we can do whatever we want,
I say it's all OK in Mihono's book too!
So, that report.@Is it really that interesting to read?

group_1.textLeft: For me, at least. Want to have a look?
These are the interior photos, hot off the@presses.

group_1.textRight: They're beautiful.
These grave goods and murals... They're in almost@mint condition, aren't they?

group_1.textLeft: Nobody expected it to be this big of a find, so@the academic world's in an uproar!
...Ooh! I hadn't seen these grave goods before.
Thank goodness...@I'm so glad they weren't ruined.

group_1.textRight: (Could artifacts from over 1000 years ago...)
(Really have been preserved in such miraculous@condition?)
(I wonder...)
(Just how much of this was part of the miracle@Kyubey caused?)

group_1.textLeft: This is thanks to you too, Kira.

group_1.textRight: Huh...? It's thanks to Kyubey, though.

group_1.textLeft: If I had given up back then, the excavation@would never have happened.

group_1.textRight: Ah... yes, I suppose.

group_1.textLeft: The reason I bounced back from that was@because you believed in me.

group_1.textRight: ...My pleasure.
Yeah, exactly!

group_1.textCenter: I hope your enjoy your time in our@'Historical Research Club'.
